recommendations: Salman Mushir / salmanneedsajob.eth ‚ÄúI am a huge admirer of Aakash's work on Doodhwala. As an early subscriber, I am fortunate to see firsthand how doodhwala has been growing a strong, not just readership, but may I say a 'cult' through their witty milkman communication and in-depth analysis of web3. One can never underestimate the grind of writing a daily newsletter while maintaining humor and creativity consistently in all their work. I have also met Aakash at various web3 events in Bangalore, and have noticed his efforts to have a finger on the pulse of the industry. I expect some cutting-edge work in media to come out of what they are building at doodhwala and wish him the best.‚Äù

MitkoüèïÔ∏è Dimitrov ‚ÄúCouldn‚Äôt speak more highly of Aakash and his newsletter! It‚Äôs THE perfect amount of info and the memes are bangers (sometimes even better than mine, unfortunately). For anyone looking to keep up with crypto in a quick and fun way, this is the newsletter for youüíØ And their branding is top notch too, I‚Äôm taking notes.‚Äù
